param.name: use_bitly
param.label: Use link shortener bit.ly
param.description: Shortens the link. Helps mainly for services like Twitter that only take a certain number of characters

param.name: username
param.label: Enter your bit.ly username if you have one
param.description: This is not required. If left blank you will use JoomlaBibleStudy's user name

param.name: api
param.label: bit.ly appkey
param.description: Not required. If using your own bit.ly user, enter your api key here.

param.name: shareimage
param.label: Enter path to share image to show
param.description: Path can be full url or relative to Joomla root with no forward slash at beginning.

param.name: shareimageh
param.label: Height of image
param.description: Can be number or number with px.

param.name: shareimagew
param.label: Width of image
param.description: Can be number or number with px.

param.name: totalcharacters
param.label: Total Characters
param.description: Total characters for string not including the path to the site.

param.name: alttext
param.label: Alt Text
param.description: Enter Title for site as alttext or hover text.
